channel.title: Help - Portfowarding and Client Sided
channel.description:
Ok, i have portfowarded and my ports are open, i have used the portfoward check tool and it verifyed that both my TCP and UDP ports are open, however, when my server is online, only one person can connect and when that person loggs out, he cant logg back in until i restart my server... Help please :)
No.2, when i click on a teleport or monster to attack etc, i get the message "Clicked 6532" for example. Help please,

item.title: Help - Portfowarding and Client Sided
item.dc:creator: @pk_owned_u pk owned u
item.description:
@pk_owned_u wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:2, topic:372392”]No1. Did you add the Ip’s in correctly, did you Compile and are you useing NO-IP DUC.

No2. “Clicked” only comes up for player rights 3. So there isn’t worry to delete it, infact it helps alot.[/quote]

Ok, thanks and yes, i did enter Ips in correctly. and my no-ip is running. i have tried portfowarding with uTorrent but that didn’t work either - help please

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Portfowarding and Client Sided
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

No1. Did you add the Ip’s in correctly, did you Compile and are you useing NO-IP DUC.

No2. “Clicked” only comes up for player rights 3. So there isn’t worry to delete it, infact it helps alot.

Read full topic
